Class Aurora.Schedules

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Aurora.Schedules
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.Schedules
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for managing schedules on the Aurora.
